H0.text: First released in 1969, which single gave David Bowie his first No. 1 in 1975. Rebel Rebel

H1.text: First released in 1969, which single gave David Bowie his first No. 1 in 1975. Suffragette City

H2.text: First released in 1969, which single gave David Bowie his first No. 1 in 1975. Ziggy Stardust

H3.text: First released in 1969, which single gave David Bowie his first No. 1 in 1975. Space Oddity

A4.text: RCA again reissued the song in the UK on 26 September 1975 as a maxi single with two B-sides: 1971's 'Changes' and the then-unreleased 1972 outtake 'Velvet Goldmine'. The UK reissue became Bowie's first number-one single in the country in November.

A5.text: Reissues by RCA Records became Bowie's first US hit in 1972, and his first UK number-one in 1975.
